page.title: 18SHOPS
page.content: All the chemists are open six days a week. Once every three weeks one of the chemists stays open extra hours. There a quite a few newsagents in Didcot. The largest is Centre News, which mostly sells cigarettes and news-papers, although it does not deliver papers. 12 people work there, most of whom are part-time. Between 500 and 600 people shop in Centre News daily. Occasionally they have shop-lifters. Another newsagent is P.K. Newsagents. The two owners, who both work there full-time, live above the shop. It is open 14 hours a day. 7 paperboys and girls deliver papers.
